metadata.title: How we build our apps with Microfrontends
metadata.description:
Known for it's benefitial long term rewards, microservices or microfrontends
for the front-end, is a pattern where we break out services and modules into
it's own mini apps per se

metadata.title: Introduction to Giffy
metadata.description:
I'm very happy to show you my new app called Giffy, which is a multi-platform and Open Source
GIF recorder
